problem.markdown:
>>The number of inputs in an inverter is ____.<< (x) 1 () 2 () 3 () 4
>>Identify which statement is true for inverter?<< () Any difference in inputs gurantees a high output () Any difference in inputs gurantees a low output () A high input gives a high output (x) A low input gives a high output
>>What are the operation states of n-device and p-device respectively in region B?<< () linear and unsaturated () cut-off and linear () linear and saturated (x) saturated and linear
>>What is desirable βn/βp ratio for an inverter?<< () 0 (x) 1 () 0.5 () ∞
>>What is delay?<< () maximum of rise time and fall time () product of rise time and fall time (x) average of rise time and fall time () addition of rise time and fall time
